title.rendered: Kevin Martinis, Account Manager Mid Atlantic

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” hover_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Kevin_Martinis_Scientific_Recruiter_Massachusetts.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Image” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ animation=”left” sticky=”off” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” always_center_on_mobile=”on”]
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” hover_enabled=”0″ z_index_tablet=”500″ use_border_color=”off”]

Kevin Martinis, Account Manager Mid Atlantic

Kevin graduated from Northeastern University with a bachelor’s degree in Behavioral Neuroscience in 2019. He played varsity baseball for Northeastern where he gained successful tools: persistence, dedication, time management, and competitiveness. Shortly after graduating he joined Clinlab Staffing as an Entry Level Recruiter and put these tools to use. High-quality training and development under Matt Logano led him to become a top recruiter in his first year. With his passion for helping others, competitive mindset, and multiple cups of coffee Kevin grew into an Account Manager Role serving the Mid-Atlantic Division in 2021.

Outside of Clinlab, you can find Kevin trying to break 80 on the golf course or enjoying time with his friends and family. He is also a die-hard Boston sports fan, frequently yelling at his TV.

Massachusetts Office

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
